channel.title: Pure Range2h F2p Clan
channel.description:
[center][b]AreYouPure?[/b][/center]
AreYouPure is a pure range2h mix f2p based clan which thrives on dominating the f2p wild. In order to join the clan you will need to fill out an application. We cannot guarantee everyone as we aim for specific preferences. Currently looking to have a strong family of 20 members. In the case that you are accepted into the clan you will be given a list of usernames to choose from. You must choose from the list because the list reflects and symbols our clan. You must also agree to the clan rules which you will receive upon acceptance.
[b]Current Members : 4[/b]
Application : [code] How often do you play rs : How long have you played rs : Do you bot : Would you consider yourself a good pker : Why do you want to join the clan :
Do you have anything you want to show us? Pk videos/pics etc etc : [/code]
All applications must be sent via pm here on these forums.

item.title: Pure Range2h F2p Clan
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

I have plenty of cash to go around. It should not cost a lot to train.

Read full topic

item.title: Pure Range2h F2p Clan
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:30, topic:405863”]How often do you play rs : everyday
How long have you played rs : since 2005
Do you bot : yer
Would you consider yourself a good pker : Kinda
Why do you want to join the clan : Experience

Do you have anything you want to show us? Pk videos/pics etc etc : Nope i don’t vid.

I’m going to create a account, and give it 5m from my main. Then train it up, for this[/quote]

I just killed chickens until 40 range and looted the feathers. I made 500k from that, which is enough to get 70 range, 40 attack, and 70 strength.

Read full topic

How often do you play rs : A few hours a night.
How long have you played rs : since around 2006 - 2007.
Do you bot : Sometimes.
Would you consider yourself a good pker : No not really, But I’d love to learn.
Why do you want to join the clan : I want to learn to PK and I have like 10m and im buying another 200m so ill have enough to pk with and shit.
[/quote]
What is the EXACT Gear and stats to get?

For a range 2h f2p account, I think 1-5m will last you long enough to learn. Each set of gear is only like 20k or so.[/quote]
